page.title: 07STENSON MARINA
page.content: Stenson Marina is ten years old.It covers an acre exactly.It is five to eight feet deep.The bottom of the Marina is never cleaned but once a month the sides are.The Marina was Sir Laurence Sanders father's idea.It took two years to build.It was filled with the River Trent water.It took three weeks to fill.The repair shed is ten metres by four metres and two metres high.It's seventeen months old.In the Marina there's room for 126 boats.It's fifty pounds per person to live on a boat at the Marina for a week.They have no toilet,which is illegal.There are sometimes vandals.There are 12 boats owned by the Marina which are hired out.There's a lot of pollution in the Marina because the sewage pipes are near the surface and are leaking. There are no plans to make the Marina bigger.By Sarah,Beth,Sharon,Catherine.
